RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Italiana, Paola Baron obteve o Mestrado na Universidade Mozarteum de Salzburg com Sarah O?Brien e se aperfeioou no Conservatrio Superior de Lyon, com Fabrice Pierre. 
Em 2018, concluiu o Doutorado em Musicologia na UNESP ? Universidade do Estado de So Paulo. 
Foi harpista principal do Teatro pera e Ballet de Liubliana (Eslovnia), da Orquestra Fondazione Arturo Toscanini (sob a regncia de Lorin Maazel), da Orchester der Tiroler Festspiele (dirigida por Gustav Kuhn) e do Bal Real de Birmingham, entre outros grupos. Atuou como solista e camerista na Itlia, Frana, Alemanha, ustria, EUA, e Brasil. 
Em 2002, obteve o segundo prmio no Victor Salvi, o mais prestigioso concurso de harpa da Itlia e, em 2007, venceu o Concurso Internacional da Associao Eslovena de Harpa. 
Professora da EMESP ? Escola de Msica do Estado de So Paulo, Paola foi harpista da Osesp de 2007 a 2014 e, atualmente, Harpista Principal da Orquestra Sinfnica Municipal de So Paulo.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Italian, Paola Baron obtained the Master Degree with highest honours at Mozarteum University in Salzburg with Sarah O?Brien and attended the Post Perfectionament course at the ?Conservatoire National Suprior de Musique? in Lyon with Fabrice Pierre. 
In 2018, she got a PHD in Musicology at So Paulo State University (UNESP), with a Thesis about connections between Luciano Berio and the Brazilian composer Flo Menezes.
She has been Principal Harpist of Teatro pera e Ballet in Ljubljana (Slovenia), Orchestra Fondazione Arturo Toscanini (Lorin Maazel cond.), Orchester der Tiroler Festspiele (Gustav Kuhn cond.) and Birmingham Royal Ballet, among others. She performed as soloist and in chamber music groups in Italy, France, Austria and Brazil. 
In 2002 she won the Second Prize at the Victor Salvi Competiton, the most prestigious harp competition in Italy, and in 2007 she won the International Competition of Slovene Harp Association. 
Professor in EMESP ? Escola de Msica do Estado de So Paulo -, Paola has been member of Osesp ? Orquestra Sinfnica do Estado de So Paulo - from 2007 to 2014 and now is Principal Harpist of Orquestra Sinfnica Municipal de So Paulo.
